oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hard rubber comb
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a hard rubber comb. It is marked "Lorraine/Geunie Hard Rubber." Hard rubber combs were commonly used during the Civil War by soldiers. Hard rubber was first widely available in the mid 1850s and thousands of products were produced. Fine toothed combs were popular with soldiers as it aided them in their constant struggle to rid themselves of lice and other vermin.
